com.whaleal.mars.core.messaging

接口 Subscription

  • 所有超级接口:
    Cancelable
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultMessageListenerContainer.TaskSubscription

    public interface Subscription
extends Cancelable

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean await(Duration timeout)
      Synchronous, blocking call returns once the Subscription becomes active or timeout exceeds.
      boolean isActive() 

      • 从接口继承的方法 com.whaleal.mars.core.messaging.Cancelable

        cancel

    • 方法详细资料

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        返回:
        true if the subscription is currently executed.

      • await

        boolean await(Duration timeout)
       throws InterruptedException
        Synchronous, blocking call returns once the Subscription becomes active or timeout exceeds.
        参数:
        timeout - must not be null.
        返回:
        true if the subscription was activated. false if the waiting time elapsed before task was activated.
        抛出:
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting.
